Title: Provides the right for group home residents to designate an essential person who would be permitted to be present and provide aid at a group home
Summary: Provides the right for group home residents to designate an essential person who would be permitted to be present and provide aid to a resident at a group home with unrestricted access; provides for regular testing of such essential persons during COVID-19.
LawCode: Amd ยง371, add ยง371-c, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing for group home residents to designate an essential person who would be permitted to be present at the group home with unrestricted access and provide aid to such resident; to provide for regular COVID-19 testing for such essential persons for the duration of the COVID-19 state disaster emergency; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions of such law relating thereto
